english.segment1: Hear these praises from a grateful heart. Each time I think of You. The praises start. Love You so much, Jesus. Love You so much
english.segment2: Lord, I love You, my soul sings. In Your presence. Carried on Your wings. Love You so much, Jesus. Love You so much
english.segment3: Chorus: How my soul longs for you. Longs to worship You forever. In Your power and majesty. Lift my hands, lift my heart. Lift my voice towards the heavens. For You are my sun and shield
